price: 39. Oh! Bato ba ngai ba boloko! Boye binzambe nzambe bazali malamu koleka to Allah wa bomoko mpe wa bokoki?
arabic: يَٰصَٰحِبَيِ ٱلسِّجۡنِ ءَأَرۡبَابٞ مُّتَفَرِّقُونَ خَيۡرٌ أَمِ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡوَٰحِدُ ٱلۡقَهَّارُ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: yāṣāḥibayi al-sij'ni a-arbābun mutafarriqūna khayrun ami al-lahu al-wāḥidu al-qahāru
